aboutMe.me: Hi there 👋🏼 I'm Maxi, a {age} year old Student from Germany.

projects.vortex: Vortex is a in java written terminal template, where you can implement your own custom commands and configs
projects.smaug_rat: A in python written RAT, with custom settings, client builder and obfuscator + custom written client.
projects.astro: Simple electron js customization with config file.
projects.gitpulse: Create your own Github Overview website, where you can customize everything.
projects.glsl_sandbox: Simple GLSLSandbox for shader testing written in Java.
projects.eve_discord_bot: EVE is a all in one Discord Bot. It comes with many features such as a Giveaway System, Application System and much more.
projects.hubx: HubX is a Minecraft Spigot Lobby plugin with many functions such as a tablist or custom join items.
projects.coinsx: CoinsX is a Minecraft Spigot Coins plugin with a MySQL database connection, daily rewards and more.
